title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death. A gripping tale of survival, sacrifice, and rebellion against tyranny.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry discovers he's a wizard on his 11th birthday and enters Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The beginning of an epic journey filled with magic, friendship, and the fight against dark forces.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
author: John Green
description: Hazel and Augustus are two teens who meet in a cancer support group. Their love story is heartbreaking and beautiful, exploring life, death, and everything in between.

title: Twilight
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: Bella Swan moves to Forks and falls for the mysterious Edward Cullen, only to discover he's a vampire. A tale of forbidden love and supernatural danger.

title: Divergent
author: Veronica Roth
description: In a world divided by factions, Tris discovers she's Divergent and doesn't fit into any one group. She must hide her identity while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens everyone she loves.

title: The Maze Runner
author: James Dashner
description: Thomas wakes up in an elevator with no memory except his name, arriving in the Glade surrounded by a massive maze. He and the other boys must solve the maze to escape and uncover the truth.

title: Percy Jackson & The Olympians: The Lightning Thief
author: Rick Riordan
description: Percy discovers he's a demigod, son of Poseidon, and must prevent a war between the Greek gods. An action-packed adventure blending modern life with ancient mythology.

title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
author: Stephen Chbosky
description: Charlie navigates high school while dealing with mental health issues and past trauma. Told through letters, it's a poignant story of friendship, love, and finding where you belong.

title: Eleanor & Park
author: Rainbow Rowell
description: Two misfits, Eleanor and Park, fall in love on the school bus. Set in 1986, this is a bittersweet story about first love and the courage to be yourself.

title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
author: Jenny Han
description: Lara Jean's secret love letters are mailed out to all her crushes, turning her life upside down. A sweet, charming romance about family, identity, and finding real love.

title: The Book Thief
author: Markus Zusak
description: Narrated by Death, this is the story of Liesel, a girl living in Nazi Germany who steals books and shares them. A haunting tale about the power of words during wartime.

title: Looking for Alaska
author: John Green
description: Miles goes to boarding school seeking 'the Great Perhaps' and meets the fascinating Alaska Young. A profound exploration of love, loss, and searching for meaning.

title: The Hate U Give
author: Angie Thomas
description: Starr witnesses the fatal shooting of her unarmed friend by a police officer. A powerful, timely story about finding your voice and fighting for justice.

title: Six of Crows
author: Leigh Bardugo
description: Six dangerous outcasts attempt an impossible heist in this fantasy world. Filled with magic, betrayal, and found family, it's an addictive page-turner.

title: The Giver
author: Lois Lowry
description: In a seemingly perfect society without pain or choice, Jonas is chosen to receive all memories of the past. He discovers the dark truth behind his community's harmony.

title: Speak
author: Laurie Halse Anderson
description: After calling the police at a party, Melinda becomes an outcast. Her journey to find her voice again after trauma is powerful and important.

title: An Ember in the Ashes
author: Sabaa Tahir
description: Laia is a slave and Elias is a soldier in the Martial Empire. Their paths cross in this brutal world inspired by ancient Rome, where they fight for freedom and survival.

title: The 5th Wave
author: Rick Yancey
description: After four waves of deadly alien attacks, Cassie fights to survive and find her brother. In a world where trust is dangerous, she must decide who to believe.

title: City of Bones
author: Cassandra Clare
description: Clary discovers a hidden world of Shadowhunters who hunt demons. As she's drawn into their world, she uncovers secrets about her past and her destiny.

title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: Feyre kills a wolf and is taken to the faerie lands as punishment. This Beauty and the Beast retelling is filled with magic, romance, and dangerous court politics.

title: The Outsiders
author: S.E. Hinton
description: Ponyboy and his gang of greasers fight against the Socs in 1960s Oklahoma. A timeless story about class divisions, family, and staying gold.

title: Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda
author: Becky Albertalli
description: Simon is gay, closeted, and being blackmailed. As he navigates coming out on his own terms, he falls for an anonymous online pen pal. A heartwarming, funny romance.

title: Red Queen
author: Victoria Aveyard
description: In a world divided by blood color, Mare discovers she has powers despite her common red blood. Thrust into the Silver elite's world, she becomes a symbol of rebellion.

title: Throne of Glass
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: Celaena is an assassin offered freedom if she wins a deadly competition to become the king's champion. Magic, romance, and political intrigue collide in this fantasy adventure.

title: Matched
author: Ally Condie
description: In a society where everything is decided for you, including your spouse, Cassia is matched with her best friend. But she glimpses another face and begins to question everything.

title: The Selection
author: Kiera Cass
description: America is selected to compete for Prince Maxon's heart in a Bachelor-style competition. In a divided society, this competition offers a chance to escape her caste.

title: Thirteen Reasons Why
author: Jay Asher
description: Clay receives cassette tapes from Hannah, who recently died by suicide, explaining the thirteen reasons why. A powerful exploration of how our actions affect others.

title: Caraval
author: Stephanie Garber
description: Scarlett finally gets tickets to Caraval, a magical performance where the audience participates. But when her sister is kidnapped, the game becomes dangerously real.

title: The Lunar Chronicles: Cinder
author: Marissa Meyer
description: Cinder is a cyborg mechanic in New Beijing who gets caught up in a revolution. This Cinderella retelling features plague, lunar people, and a prince in disguise.

title: Delirium
author: Lauren Oliver
description: In a world where love is considered a disease, Lena awaits the cure. But 95 days before her procedure, she falls in love and must choose between safety and freedom.

title: Legend
author: Marie Lu
description: June is a military prodigy and Day is the Republic's most wanted criminal. When their paths cross, they uncover shocking truths about their dystopian society.

title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
author: Ransom Riggs
description: Jacob discovers an orphanage for children with peculiar abilities, illustrated with vintage photographs. A dark, imaginative tale blending reality and fantasy.

title: We Were Liars
author: E. Lockhart
description: Cadence can't remember what happened the summer she nearly drowned. As she pieces together the truth about her privileged family, dark secrets emerge.

title: The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian
author: Sherman Alexie
description: Junior leaves his troubled school on the Spokane Indian Reservation to attend an all-white school. A funny, heartbreaking story about identity and perseverance.

title: Carry On
author: Rainbow Rowell
description: Simon is the worst Chosen One ever. In his final year at magic school, he must defeat the Insidious Humdrum while dealing with his feelings for his vampire roommate.

title: The Darkest Minds
author: Alexandra Bracken
description: After a disease kills most children and gives survivors powers, Ruby escapes a government camp. She joins other powered kids on the run from those who fear them.

title: Shatter Me
author: Tahereh Mafi
description: Juliette's touch is lethal. Locked away as a weapon, she's drawn into a rebellion when she meets someone who can touch her. A lyrical, intense dystopian romance.

title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
author: Cassandra Clare
description: When Clary's mother disappears, she's drawn into the world of Shadowhunters who hunt demons. Urban fantasy filled with action, romance, and shocking revelations.

title: Uglies
author: Scott Westerfeld
description: In a world where everyone gets surgery at 16 to become 'pretty,' Tally awaits her turn. But meeting rebels who reject the surgery makes her question everything.

title: The Scorpio Races
author: Maggie Stiefvater
description: Every year, riders race deadly water horses from the sea. Puck is the first girl to enter, and Sean is the returning champion. A unique, atmospheric fantasy.

title: Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz
description: Aristotle and Dante become friends one summer, changing each other's lives forever. A beautiful, poetic story about identity, family, and first love.

title: The Raven Boys
author: Maggie Stiefvater
description: Blue has been told she'll kill her true love if she kisses him. When she joins four private school boys searching for a sleeping Welsh king, magic and danger unfold.

title: Firefly Lane
author: Kristin Hannah
description: Tully and Kate become best friends in the 1970s and their bond spans decades. A moving story about the enduring power of female friendship through life's ups and downs.

title: The Princess Diaries
author: Meg Cabot
description: Mia discovers she's a princess and heir to the throne of Genovia. A hilarious, heartwarming story about finding yourself when your life turns upside down.

title: If I Stay
author: Gayle Forman
description: After a car accident leaves her in a coma, Mia has an out-of-body experience where she must choose whether to live or die. A heartbreaking story about love and loss.

title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
author: Ann Brashares
description: Four best friends find a pair of jeans that magically fits them all. As they share the pants over the summer, they share their adventures and stay connected.

title: Vampire Academy
author: Richelle Mead
description: Rose is training to be a guardian to her best friend Lissa, a vampire princess. Action, romance, and vampire politics collide in this addictive series starter.

title: Hush, Hush
author: Becca Fitzpatrick
description: Nora is drawn to the mysterious Patch despite sensing danger. As she uncovers his secrets, she discovers fallen angels and a deadly conspiracy.

title: Fallen
author: Lauren Kate
description: Luce is drawn to Daniel at her new school, but he seems to know her. Their connection spans lifetimes in this romantic tale of fallen angels and eternal love.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
author: John Green
description: Two teens meet at a cancer support group and embark on a life-changing journey. A beautiful meditation on life, death, and making the most of the time we have.

title: Shadow and Bone
author: Leigh Bardugo
description: Alina discovers she has a rare power that could save her war-torn country. Swept into the lavish Grisha world, she uncovers dangerous secrets and dark magic.

title: Graceling
author: Kristin Cashore
description: Katsa has a Grace for killing and serves as the king's enforcer. When she meets Prince Po, she begins to question her role and discover the true nature of her power.

title: Ella Enchanted
author: Gail Carson Levine
description: Cursed with obedience, Ella must do anything she's told. This charming Cinderella retelling follows her quest to break the curse and control her own destiny.

title: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
description: Kvothe tells his story: from a traveling performer to a legendary wizard. Epic fantasy filled with beautiful prose, magic, music, and mystery.

title: Eragon
author: Christopher Paolini
description: Eragon finds a dragon egg and becomes a Dragon Rider, last hope against the evil king. A classic fantasy adventure filled with magic, dragons, and destiny.

title: The Golden Compass
author: Philip Pullman
description: Lyra journeys to the Arctic to rescue kidnapped children, uncovering a sinister plot. A rich fantasy exploring parallel worlds, science, and religion.

title: A Wrinkle in Time
author: Madeleine L'Engle
description: Meg travels through space and time to rescue her father from evil forces. A classic sci-fi adventure about the power of love and individuality.

title: The Host
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: An alien soul inhabits Melanie's body but can't erase her consciousness. Together they form an unlikely alliance in this story about humanity and identity.

title: Daughter of Smoke & Bone
author: Laini Taylor
description: Karou collects teeth for her mysterious guardian and dreams of another life. When she meets a beautiful angel, she uncovers her true identity and a war between worlds.

title: I'll Give You the Sun
author: Jandy Nelson
description: Twins Noah and Jude tell their story from different times, revealing how their family fell apart. A beautiful, emotional story about art, love, and healing.

title: Everything, Everything
author: Nicola Yoon
description: Maddy is allergic to the world and hasn't left her house in seventeen years. When a boy moves in next door, she risks everything for love and freedom.

title: The Sun Is Also a Star
author: Nicola Yoon
description: Natasha is being deported and Daniel is on his way to an interview. They meet and fall in love in one day, questioning fate, love, and the universe.

title: Stargirl
author: Jerry Spinelli
description: Stargirl is wonderfully different - kind, weird, and genuine. When she joins Leo's high school, she changes everything, challenging the pressure to conform.

title: Paper Towns
author: John Green
description: When Margo disappears, Quentin follows her clues across Florida. A mystery about perception, identity, and learning that people are more complex than we imagine.

title: Beautiful Creatures
author: Kami Garcia & Margaret Stohl
description: In a small Southern town, Ethan meets the mysterious Lena, a Caster with a family curse. Gothic romance blending magic, history, and forbidden love.

title: Holes
author: Louis Sachar
description: Stanley is sent to a detention camp where boys dig holes in the desert. As past and present intertwine, a clever story about justice and breaking curses unfolds.

title: Wonder
author: R.J. Palacio
description: Auggie has a facial difference and starts fifth grade at a mainstream school. A moving story about kindness, acceptance, and choosing to be more than ordinary.

title: The Lightning Thief
author: Rick Riordan
description: Percy discovers he's a demigod and must prevent war among the Greek gods. Fast-paced adventure mixing mythology with modern life and plenty of humor.

title: Clockwork Angel
author: Cassandra Clare
description: Tessa discovers she can shape-shift and is pulled into Victorian London's Shadowhunter world. Steampunk, demons, and a love triangle in gaslit London.

title: The Knife of Never Letting Go
author: Patrick Ness
description: Todd lives in a town where everyone can hear everyone's thoughts. When he discovers a patch of silence, he must flee and uncover the truth about his world.

title: Crank
author: Ellen Hopkins
description: Kristina tries meth once and becomes addicted. Written in verse, this raw, honest story explores addiction's devastating impact on a teen and her family.

title: The Graveyard Book
author: Neil Gaiman
description: After his family is murdered, baby Bod is raised by ghosts in a graveyard. A unique coming-of-age story blending mystery, fantasy, and dark humor.

title: Coraline
author: Neil Gaiman
description: Coraline finds a door to an alternate world where her 'Other Mother' wants to keep her forever. A creepy, captivating tale about courage and appreciating what you have.

title: The Chocolate War
author: Robert Cormier
description: Jerry refuses to sell chocolates for his school's fundraiser, standing up to a secret society and a corrupt teacher. A dark, provocative story about conformity.

title: The Inheritance Games
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes
description: Avery inherits a billionaire's fortune and must live with his hostile grandsons to solve elaborate puzzles. A page-turning mystery full of twists and riddles.

title: One of Us Is Lying
author: Karen M. McManus
description: Five students enter detention, but only four leave alive. Everyone has secrets, and everyone is a suspect in this addictive murder mystery.

title: They Both Die at the End
author: Adam Silvera
description: Mateo and Rufus receive calls saying they'll die today. They meet through an app and spend their last day living fully. A moving meditation on life and death.

title: Children of Blood and Bone
author: Tomi Adeyemi
description: Zélie fights to restore magic to her people after a brutal monarchy destroyed all magi. West African-inspired fantasy about oppression, resistance, and power.

title: The Cruel Prince
author: Holly Black
description: Jude is mortal living in the treacherous High Court of Faerie. To belong, she'll scheme and fight, especially against the cruel Prince Cardan.

title: Scythe
author: Neal Shusterman
description: In a world without death, Scythes are chosen to kill to control population. Citra and Rowan are apprenticed to a scythe, but only one can emerge.

title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
description: Amir recalls his childhood in Afghanistan and a terrible betrayal of his best friend Hassan. Decades later, he gets a chance at redemption.

title: Code Name Verity
author: Elizabeth Wein
description: A British spy is captured in Nazi-occupied France and writes her confession. The story of an extraordinary friendship between two young women during WWII.

title: The Westing Game
author: Ellen Raskin
description: Sixteen people are chosen as heirs to Sam Westing's fortune and must solve the puzzle of who killed him. A clever, complex mystery with memorable characters.

title: Sabriel
author: Garth Nix
description: Sabriel must enter Death itself to rescue her father, the Abhorsen who keeps the dead from returning. Dark fantasy with a unique magic system.

title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
description: Ender is trained at Battle School to lead Earth's defense against an alien invasion. A brilliant exploration of war, morality, and the cost of victory.

title: The Hate U Give
author: Angie Thomas
description: After witnessing police kill her friend, Starr must decide whether to speak out. A powerful story about finding your voice and demanding justice.

title: Dear Martin
author: Nic Stone
description: After a racist encounter, Justyce writes letters to Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. to process his experiences. A powerful exploration of race and justice in America.

title: The Poet X
author: Elizabeth Acevedo
description: Xiomara writes poetry to express feelings she can't voice in her strict household. A novel in verse about finding your voice and claiming your identity.

title: Dumplin'
author: Julie Murphy
description: Willowdean enters a beauty pageant to prove a point to her former beauty-queen mother. A fun, empowering story about self-acceptance and confidence.

title: The House of the Scorpion
author: Nancy Farmer
description: Matt is a clone of a powerful drug lord, raised to provide organs. This thought-provoking sci-fi explores identity, humanity, and what makes us who we are.

title: A Monster Calls
author: Patrick Ness
description: Conor's mother is dying, and a monster visits him at night to tell stories. A heartbreaking, beautiful exploration of grief, truth, and letting go.

title: The Absolutely True Diary of a Part-Time Indian
author: Sherman Alexie
description: Junior leaves the reservation to attend an all-white school. A funny, heartbreaking story about identity, poverty, and finding hope.

title: A Darker Shade of Magic
author: V.E. Schwab
description: Kell is one of few who can travel between parallel Londons. When he smuggles a dangerous artifact, he teams up with a thief to save the worlds.

title: The Wrath & the Dawn
author: Renée Ahdieh
description: Shahrzad volunteers to marry the murderous Caliph, planning revenge. But she discovers there's more to him than she thought in this lush Arabian Nights retelling.

title: Twilight
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: Bella falls for Edward, a vampire, beginning an epic supernatural romance. The start of a cultural phenomenon about love, danger, and impossible choices.

title: Shadowhunters: City of Bones
author: Cassandra Clare
description: Clary enters the hidden world of Shadowhunters who protect humans from demons. Urban fantasy packed with action, romance, and shocking family secrets.

title: Little Women
author: Louisa May Alcott
description: The March sisters grow up during the Civil War, each pursuing their dreams. A timeless classic about family, ambition, and the bonds between sisters.

title: The Princess Bride
author: William Goldman
description: Buttercup and Westley's true love story features pirates, revenge, sword fights, and miracles. A hilarious, romantic adventure that's a beloved classic.

title: Number the Stars
author: Lois Lowry
description: Annemarie helps her Jewish best friend escape Nazi-occupied Denmark. A powerful, accessible story about courage and friendship during the Holocaust.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
author: Katherine Paterson
description: Jess and Leslie create an imaginary kingdom in the woods. A beautiful, heartbreaking story about friendship, imagination, and coping with loss.
